entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
